songs.artist: YoungBoy Never Broke Again & reGGie X Hurricane Wisdom

changes.description: Massive Energy update with performance upgrades, new systems, and fun activities [10+ NEW HOOD AREAS]
changes.title: Energy 2.0

changes.description: 4 New Types Of Crafting Benches w/ Blueprint System 50+ new blueprints & public benches can be found across the city.
changes.title: CRAFTING 2.0

changes.description: Brand New Spawn UI
changes.title: SPAWN 2.0

changes.description: 60+ Levels Added To Battlepass!
changes.title: BATTLEPASS 2.0

changes.description: Big optimization pass on all clothing to help with performance and reduce overall city lag. Duplicates removed and optimized clothing is now under 'textures/'.
changes.title: CLOTHING UPDATE 2.0

changes.description: New Apartment System Added With MLO Interior [ESCLIPSE TOWER]
changes.title: APARTMENT UPDATE 2.0

changes.description: MLOs and vehicles tuned and optimized for better performance across the city.
changes.title: MLO & VEHICLE OPTIMIZATION

changes.description: Realistic EMS system with limb-based injury logic, new ragdoll mechanics for running/falling/jumping, and different healing tools for civilians and police.
changes.title: NEW AMBULANCE SYSTEM

changes.description: Painkillers (for civilians) and IFAKs (for police) can now be used to stop bleeding and stabilize injuries.
changes.title: INJURY SYSTEM + HEALING ITEMS

changes.description: Fully redesigned notification system to better match the custom Energy UI style.
changes.title: NOTIFICATION SYSTEM 2.0

changes.description: Progress bars have been completely redesigned to better align with the Energy look and feel.
changes.title: PROGRESS BAR SYSTEM 2.0

changes.description: New animated loading screen with immersive visual design customized for Energy.
changes.title: LOADING SCREEN 2.0

changes.description: New custom pause menu designed to fit the theme and layout of Energy.
changes.title: PAUSE MENU

changes.description: Therapy Has Been Added To Pillbox To Get Crutches Off Early [$75,000]
changes.title: THERAPY SYSTEM

changes.description: New radio system added with realistic radio animations for better immersion.
changes.title: RADIO SYSTEM

changes.description: Weapons now visibly stay on your back while reloading skins, driving, or switching weapons.
changes.title: WEAPON ON BACK SYSTEM

changes.description: Vehicle contracts now handled at PDM to avoid scams when selling cars.
changes.title: VEHICLE SELLING CONTRACTS

changes.description: New optimized vehicle key system that works reliably across all vehicle types.
changes.title: VEHICLE KEY SYSTEM

changes.description: New hospital interior now located in Pillbox, offering improved performance and layout.
changes.title: NEW PILLBOX HOSPITAL

changes.description: Business crafting system and boss menu have been streamlined for better ease of use for business owners.
changes.title: BUSINESS CRAFTING/BOSS MENU

changes.description: New arcade event added at Postal 910 for fun competitive events.
changes.title: Energy ARCADES

changes.description: 3 New Area's To Relief Stress Have Been Added Under YOGA ZONES!.
changes.title: STRESS RELIEF AREAS

players.description: SYNDICATE has dominated the streets this month with strategic takeovers, relentless turf control, and a reputation that leaves their enemies second-guessing every move. Power house & Feared, respected, and always a step ahead  they have earned their spot at the top.
players.name: SYNDICATE

players.description: Aristotle Mendoza has set the standard this month with sharp investigative work, unmatched professionalism, and relentless pursuit of justice. From undercover ops to high-stakes busts, He's proven why he's a key player in the LSPD and more than earned her spot as Police Officer of the Month.
players.name: Aristotle Mendoza

players.description: Polar ICE has gone above and beyond this month, setting a new standard for excellence in service and quality. Through teamwork, leadership, and dedication, we’ve continued to exceed expectations and drive success. We’re proud of our achievements and excited for what’s ahead.
players.name: Polar ICE

store.description: Check out exclusive in-game packages designed to level up your experience while helping support the continued growth and quality of Energy Roleplay
store.title: Energy STORE
